name: ListInterviewEvents
description:
Retrieve a list of interview events for a schedule.

Use this tool to obtain a list of interview events linked to a specified interview schedule. It requires the necessary read permissions for accessing interview data.

parameters.name: schedule_id
parameters.description: The ID of the interview schedule to fetch events for. Ensure necessary permissions are granted.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
